comment: Detailed PCF with comprehensive uncertainty analysis

pcf.boundaryProcessesDescription: Cradle-to-gate including fiber production, resin manufacturing, and composite formation
pcf.exemptedEmissionsDescription: Minor additives and catalysts below threshold

uncertaintyAssessment.description: Monte Carlo simulation with 10,000 iterations. 95% confidence interval: ±15% of reported value. Primary uncertainty sources: electricity grid mix (±8%), transportation distances (±12%), and process efficiency (±5%). Analysis conducted according to ISO 14067:2018 guidelines.
